desc: Wheeky® Pets is a family-owned business focused on new product development and innovation for the pet market. We are the inventors, manufacturer and brand owner of STAYbowl® Tip-Proof Bowl for guinea pigs, and other small pets, the Wheeky® Treat Ball, and other Wheeky® Pet brands. We love our customers and their pets!

layout.text: We love our customers and their pets!
